name: Lando Calrissian (V)
Lore: 'Scoundrel and gambler. Petty administrator of a small Tibanna gas mining operation. Easily coerced. Has problems of his own. Had dealings with the Tonnika sisters - twice.',
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots.  Once per turn, while present at a battleground site, may use 1 Force to add or subtract 1 from a just drawn weapon or battle destiny (or from opponent''s just drawn destiny).',
